
		<h1 class="postTitle">
			<a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/insus/p/18638016" title="发布于 2024-12-29 01:15">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">图片使用LightBox浏览</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p>在N多年前，在公司内部实现相似功能的图片浏览的网站，如公司团建，年会，聚餐，活动，外出旅游......<br>以前，是以二进制数据流实现的，而且数据库没有存储图片任何信息，直接访问文件夹图片，因此得写好几个ashx，附带上目录。<br>图集目录，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228234009499-157756633.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228234009499-157756633.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>进入某一图集，可以看到图片展示，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228234116031-1147652027.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228234116031-1147652027.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>点击图片左下角的绿色箭头或者点击缩略图片，均可浏览到图片原图。<br>点击箭头右边的小方框，也可以浏览到图片原图。<br><br><a href="https://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Lightbox</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <a href="https://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/</a></p>
<p>现在已经是LightBox 2了。<br><br>现今天，Insus.NET以LightBox2再次把实现此类功能，分享出来。</p>
<p>&nbsp;参考上面网站，虽然是英文网站，实现起来，超简单的。<br><br>在你的project的Content目录下，创建lightbox目录，把下载下来的css,images,js拷贝过来。<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228235020934-901286743.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228235020934-901286743.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>html代码，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228235756345-265557162.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241228235756345-265557162.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>上截图，#27行的js文档，<br><br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241229000551564-1539180848.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241229000551564-1539180848.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p><br>#69~#70行代码在截屏时，去移除了，可以参考下面完整代码，</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span> '&lt;a class="" href="/Original/' + item.OriginalFileName +
     '" data-lightbox="herb-set" data-title=""&gt;&lt;img class="" src="/Thumbnail/' + item.ThumbnailFileName + '" alt=""/&gt;&lt;/a&gt;';</pre>
</div>
<p><br>现在来看看效果，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241229010416830-1840790165.gif" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241229010416830-1840790165.gif" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;最后，Insus.NET想说的是，LightBox 授权，<a href="https://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/#license" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">https://lokeshdhakar.com/projects/lightbox2/#license</a><br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241229010740795-917121530.png" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202412/28036-20241229010740795-917121530.png" alt=""></a></p>
<p><br><br></p>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

		</div>
